IMAGE_VERIFICATION_MESSAGE: The newly uploaded image will be under review. Until it is approved, the previous image will still be used.
CONFIRM_DISABLE_PROMO_WARNING: By disabling the promotion, you will cancel all unused user coupons. Are you sure you want to disable the promotion?
NO_ACTIVE_PROMOS: You currently have no active promos for your business
VERIFICATION_IN_PROGRESS: We are verifying your activity data
DECLARATION_VERIFICATION: I declare that I am aware that once the activity is saved, it will be subject to verification. Until validated, it will not be visible to users.

IMG_HOME: DISCOVER A WIDE RANGE OF DEALS
COMPLETE_VERIFICATION_MESSAGE: To register an activity, complete the account verification by checking your inbox and clicking on the link we sent you.
DESCRIPTIONTOREGISTER: Are you a business in the food & beverage industry? Join ReaDeal and make your offers known! With our app, you have the freedom to create promotions tailored to your customers: discounts, 2-for-1, bundle packages and more! Showcase the best of your business and attract new customers easily and directly. Register now and take advantage of our platform to increase your visibility and boost sales!
VISIBLEONREADEAL: In just a few steps, your business will be visible on ReaDeal.
OFFERDISCOUNTS: Offer discounts, 2-for-1 deals, bundle packages and more by choosing duration, days and times.
CREATEPROMOTION: Create promotions for vegans, vegetarians, families, couples and more.
NOCOMMISSIONSDESCRIPTION: We do not charge commission for booked coupons, all the profit is yours.
SHOPONLINE: When will my business be online?
SHOPONLINEDESCRIPTION: Once the registration is complete, you will be able to activate it on our app. Verifications will then be performed, and once completed, it will be online.
HOWCREATEPROMOTION: How do I create my promotion?
COVERPHOTOCHANGED: The cover photo has been changed and needs to be verified, for now the old cover photo will be displayed in searches.
CHECKREMOVEFAVORITES: Do you want to remove it from favorites?
HAVEBUSINESS: Do you have a business? Register with us!
LEARNBENEFITS: Learn all the benefits and see how to do it
PromoIsUpDetail:
To use it, show up at the business and show them the coupon in the 'ACTIVE COUPONS' section so they can confirm its use.
For more information view the terms of use in the info.
ReservationDetail: *By clicking on confirm you declare that you are aware of the conditions of the promotion and the policies for use and possible cancellation. For more information on this go to Info
AboutAcquireCoupon: You're about to acquire the coupon
TITLE: Title
CompleteVerificationToCoupon: In order to claim a coupon, complete verification by checking your inbox and clicking on the link we sent you.

ERRORS.MUNICIPALITY_CHAR_NOT_ALLOWED: The Municipality field contains characters that are not allowed
ERRORS.REFERENCE_TIME: Enter at least one reference time
ERRORS.INSERT_CLOSING_TIME: Where an opening time has been entered, also enter a closing time
ERRORS.INSERT_OPENING_TIME: Where a closing time has been entered, also enter an opening time
ERRORS.START_NOT_GREATER_END: The start time cannot be greater than the end time
ERRORS.TITLE_MAX_LENGTH: The maximum length for the title is 50 characters
ERRORS.TITLE_MIN_LENGTH: The minimum length for the title is 5 characters
ERRORS.TITLE_NOT_ONLY_NUMBERS: The title cannot contain only numbers
ERRORS.START_DATE_LESS_TODAY: The validity start date cannot be less than today
ERRORS.END_DATE_LESS_TODAY: The end date of validity cannot be less than today
ERRORS.END_DATE_LESS_START: The end date of validity cannot be less than the start date
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_MAX_LENGTH_150: The maximum length for the description is 150 characters
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_MIN_LENGTH_5: The minimum length for the description is 5 characters
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_NOT_ONLY_NUMBERS: The description cannot contain only numbers
ERRORS.DAYS_OF_WEEK: Indicate the days of the week
ERRORS.START_TIME_REQUIRED: Indicate the start time of validity
ERRORS.END_TIME_REQUIRED: Indicate the end time of validity
ERRORS.TYPES_OF_OFFER_REQUIRED: Indicate one or more types of offer
ERRORS.MAXIMUM_TYPES: A maximum of 5 types can be entered
ERRORS.MAX_COUPONS_9999: No more than 9999 maximum coupons can be entered
ERRORS.MAX_COUPONS_9999_PER_PERSON: No more than 9999 maximum coupons per person can be entered
ERRORS.ACCOUNT_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL: There is already an account with different credentials
ERRORS.EMAIL_FOR_RESET: Enter a valid email to request a password reset
ERRORS.CHECK_EMAIL: Check your email to reset your password
ERRORS.NEW_PASS_NOT_BE_OLD: The new password cannot be the same as the old one
ERRORS.ACTIVITY_INSERTION_ERROR: An error occurred during the activity insertion.
ERRORS.PERIODTYPEREQUIRED: Please select at least one time of day for the promotion.
ERRORS.TYPEPROMOFOODORDRINK: Please select whether the promotion applies to food, drinks, or both.
ERRORS.MAXPERIODS: You can select up to 3 times of day.

MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_COMPLETE: Registration complete. Check your email to verify your account.
